title: install xpsp2 from net without support

forumNotes.author: cherif
forumNotes.content:
Hi !  
I'd like to install xp by Pxe on laptop.  
i've NSLU2 with Debian for tftpd and a router WRT54G (dd-wrt) for DHCP Server .  

I managed to install Debian by this way in ma laptop .  
How can i do this , to install xpxp2.  

I see this page to make RIS   
[http://www.tzim.net/?win_netinstall_fr](http://www.tzim.net/?win_netinstall_fr "External link")  

I'd like to use NSLU2 : can i put the folder RIS in my tftpd ( NSLU2) and install xpsp2 ?  

thank you   

excuse me , i'm french .....

forumNotes.author: was_jaclaz
forumNotes.content:
Check this:  
[http://ping.windowsd...com/winner.html](http://ping.windowsdream.com/winner.html "External link")  

Or browse the forum, there are several threads about installing Windows from PXE, using tftpd32, I guess the procedure is tha same, as long as NSLU2 can be configured with same parameters of tftp32.  

jaclaz

forumNotes.author: spacepure
forumNotes.content: However, I'm not quite good at French posted from your link.
